content:
Prev: Ashley at bat Up: Hot Shots vs Blue Crew Next: Kayla at bat

Coach Todd comforts Brittany



She was the first of five Hot Shot batters to be hit by pitches: Brittany, Jennifer, Kelsey, Lindsey, and Sara. The last three were hit consecutively in the same inning.
Taken Monday, March 15, 2004, 05:42:54pm.  Original image size: 2048x3072, 7.3Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS D60, 1/400s @ F4.0, ISO 800, 70-200mm/F2.8+1.4x @ 280mm (448mm equiv)
PS7 CRW 5800:10, 0.5:3:55:60:5:25:25+M, Median 1, USM 50:3:2, Desat shadows 40%, Curves 0:0 - 20:10 - 36:25 - 255:255
